title: How to split screen on my Android phone - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have android 9 pie then open the task view. At the top of an app you want to see in split screen, tap and hold the icon for it. A drop down menu will come and then select split screen. Next go through the task menu more to find another app you also want to see and click on it at the top. You can adjust the size by drawing the black bar between them. You can also go to the task viewer and select the app you want to split screen by doing the previous. Then close the viewer, the first app will be in split screen. Next just open another app that you also want to see in split screen either from the desktop or app drawer. Not all apps support split screen and you will usually get a warning if it doesn't.

Open the app that you want to use in split screen. Tap the recent apps button on your smartphone. Tap and hold the app tile and then drag it to the split screen menu which appears while dragging. If the above method does not work,then without dragging,click and hold the app icon which appears on the top of the app tile.Then,click split-screen menu which appears there. Then head to the app drawer, and select the second app which you want to use with the previous app. NOTE : I have given this tutorial to open split screen on android pie (stock android). If you want tutorial for any other version,ask on the comments.

I don’t know of any apps but try this…. Use two apps at once ("split screen") Swipe up from the bottom of your screen to the top. If you see All Apps , tap it.Open an app.From the bottom of your screen, swipe up, hold, then let go.Touch and hold the app's icon.Tap Split screen.You'll see two screens. In the second screen, tap another app.
